title: Wayne David – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak Being Fined for Breaking Rules
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Wayne David, the Labour MP for Caerphilly, on Twitter on 12 April 2022.
content:
Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak should both resign. Both have broken the law and both have lied to the British people. Enough is enough. The country deserves better.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
